00045 /**
00046  * @brief Insert group of indexes into grouping of given name
00047  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00048  * @param group - integers that belong to a group
00049  */
00050 unsigned int IdxGroup::addGroup(std::string grouping_name, std::vector<unsigned int> group) {
00051   unsigned int grouping_idx;
00052   if (groupingNameExists(grouping_name)) {
00053     grouping_idx = m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name];
00054     m_groups[grouping_idx].push_back(group);
00055 
00056   }
00057   else {
00058     m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx.insert(std::pair<std::string,unsigned int>(grouping_name, m_grouping_count++));
00059     std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > new_grouping_vec(1, group);
00060     m_groups.push_back(new_grouping_vec);
00061     std::vector<unsigned int> new_element_idx_vec;
00062     m_element_idx_to_group_idx.push_back(new_element_idx_vec);
00063     grouping_idx = m_grouping_count - 1;
00064   }
00065   
00066   unsigned int new_group_idx = m_groups[grouping_idx].size() - 1;
00067   for (int i = 0; i < group.size(); i++) {
00068     if (group[i] == m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx].size()) {
00069       m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx].push_back(new_group_idx);
00070     }
00071     else {
00072       if (group[i] > m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx].size()) {
00073         m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx].resize(group[i] + 1, 0);
00074       }
00075       else { // if (group[i] < m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx].size())
00076         if (m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx][group[i]] != 0) {
00077           Verbose::warn(1, "IdxGroup::addGroup -- Adding element index:" + ToStr(group[i]) + " more than once to same grouping name:" + grouping_name);
00078         }
00079       }
00080       m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx][group[i]] = new_group_idx;
00081     }
00082   }
00083   return new_group_idx;
00084 }

00087 /**
00088  * @brief Get count of groups with given grouping name
00089  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00090  */
00091 int IdxGroup::getGroupCount(std::string grouping_name) {
00092   int rtn_val = 0;
00093   if (groupingNameExists(grouping_name)) {
00094     rtn_val =  m_groups[m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name]].size();
00095   }
00096   return rtn_val;
00097 }

00099 /**
00100  * @brief Get vector of vectors constituting the groups of indexes for given grouping name
00101  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00102  */
00103 std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > IdxGroup::getGroupingVec(std::string grouping_name) {
00104   if (groupingNameRequire(grouping_name)) {
00105     return m_groups[m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name]];
00106   }
00107   else {
00108     std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > empty;
00109     return empty;
00110   }
00111 }

00113 /**
00114  * @brief Get group at given index with given grouping name
00115  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00116  * @param group_idx - index of group in grouping vector
00117  */
00118 std::vector<unsigned int> IdxGroup::getGroup(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int group_idx) {
00119   if (groupIdxRequire(grouping_name, group_idx)) {
00120     return m_groups[m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name]][group_idx];
00121   }
00122   else {
00123     std::vector<unsigned int> empty;
00124     return empty;
00125   }
00126 }

00137 /**
00138  * @brief Get group containing given index with given grouping name
00139  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00140  * @param idx - element inside group of interest
00141  */
00142 std::vector<unsigned int> IdxGroup::getGroupContainingIdx(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int idx) {
00143   if (elementIdxRequire(grouping_name, idx)) { 
00144     unsigned int grouping_idx = m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name];
00145     return m_groups[grouping_idx][m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx][idx]];
00146   }
00147   else {
00148     std::vector<unsigned int> empty;
00149     return empty;
00150   }
00151 }
00152 
00153 /**
00154  * @brief Get other elements of a group containing given index with given grouping name
00155  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00156  * @param idx - element inside group of interest
00157  */
00158 std::vector<unsigned int> IdxGroup::getOthersGroupContainingIdx(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int idx) {
00159   std::vector<unsigned int> rtn_vec;
00160   if (elementIdxRequire(grouping_name, idx)) {
00161     unsigned int grouping_idx = m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name];
00162     rtn_vec = m_groups[grouping_idx][m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx][idx]];
00163     std::vector<unsigned int>::iterator it = rtn_vec.begin();
00164     while (it != rtn_vec.end() && idx != *it) {
00165       it++;
00166     }
00167     if (it == rtn_vec.end()) {
00168       Err::errAbort("IdxGroup::getOthersGroupContainingIdx -- Data integrity error.  Cannot find expected index element: " + ToStr(idx) + " in grouping name: " + grouping_name + " at group index: " + ToStr(m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx][idx]));
00169     }
00170     else {
00171       rtn_vec.erase(it);
00172     }
00173   }
00174   return rtn_vec;
00175 }

00178 /**
00179  * @brief Verify that the grouping name exists
00180  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00181  */
00182 bool IdxGroup::groupingNameRequire(std::string grouping_name) {
00183   if (m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx.count(grouping_name)) {
00184     return true;
00185   }
00186   else {
00187     Verbose::warn(0, "IdxGroup::groupingNameRequire -- Given group_name: " + grouping_name + " is not a valid groupname");
00188     return false;
00189   }
00190 }
00191 
00192 /**
00193  * @brief Verify that the given group index is valid for the given grouping name
00194  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00195  * @param group_idx - index of group in grouping vector
00196  */
00197 bool IdxGroup::groupIdxRequire(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int group_idx) {
00198   if (groupingNameRequire(grouping_name)) {
00199     if (group_idx < m_groups[m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name]].size()) {
00200       return true;
00201     }
00202     else {
00203       Verbose::warn(0, "IdxGroup::groupIdxRequire -- Given group_idx: " + ToStr(group_idx) + " is not a valid index for given grouping_name: " + grouping_name);
00204     }
00205   }
00206   return false;
00207 }
00208 
00209 /**
00210  * @brief Verify that the given group index is valid for the given grouping name
00211  * @param groupname - name of grouping
00212  * @param group_idx - index of group in grouping vector
00213  */
00214 bool IdxGroup::elementIdxRequire(std::string grouping_name, unsigned int idx) {
00215   if (groupingNameRequire(grouping_name)) {
00216     unsigned int grouping_idx = m_grouping_name_to_grouping_idx[grouping_name];
00217     if (idx < m_element_idx_to_group_idx[grouping_idx].size()) {
00218       return true;
00219     }
00220     else {
00221       Verbose::warn(0, "IdxGroup::elementIdxRequire -- Given idx element: " + ToStr(idx) + " has not been entered for given grouping_name: " + grouping_name);
00222     }
00223   }
00224   return false;
00225 }
